title: Forest Global Configuration
description: Global configuration for the forest CLI tool.

worktree_dir.description: Default directory for storing worktrees. Organized as <worktree_dir>/<project>/<branch>. Supports ~ for home directory.

branch.description: Default branch to base new worktrees on.

layout.description: Default tmux window layout for new sessions. Each entry creates a window. The first entry runs in the initial window.

window.description: A tmux window in the session layout.

name.description: Tmux window title. If empty, tmux uses its default.

command.description: Shell command to run in this window. An empty string opens a plain shell.
